snippet: Mayor Kevin Johnson of Sacramento said a deal to sell the Kings to a group led by the software tycoon Vivek Ranadive had been signed.
abstract: Sacramento Mayor Kevin Johnson says deal to sell Sacramento Kings to group led by software tycoon Vivek Ranadive has been signed, pending NBA approval.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Kevin Johnson of Sacramento said a deal to sell the Kings to a group led by the software tycoon Vivek Ranadive had been signed.

headline.seo: Deal Reached on Sale of Kings
headline.main: Deal Reached on Sale of Kings
headline.print_headline: Deal on Sale of Kings Is Signed
